title: Q&A Backend Integration
description: DEPRECATED: Direct streaming from AI Engine replaces backend proxy. Update to minimal integration if needed for non-streaming queries. Keep askLegalQuestion GraphQL mutation as fallback for compatibility but mark as deprecated. Document that new streaming approach bypasses backend for chat queries.
